itemInfo.itemDesc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.

item.name: Wheat
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Costa Farm, Moretti Plantation, and Northern Wheat Plantation. It can also be obtained by Farming Wheat Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Barley
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Northern Wheat Plantation. It can also be obtained by Farming Barley Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Potato
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Bartali Farm, Finto Farm, and Loggia Farm. It can also be obtained by Farming Potato Seeds using a Garden or by Gathering Potatoes using Bare Hands or a Hoe..

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Sweet Potato
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Shuri Farm. It can also be obtained by Farming Sweet Potato Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Corn
item.desc: Grow it from the corn seed. Mostly used as an ingredient for cooking.\n - How to Obtain : Toscani Farm. Can be obtained from corns or cultivated from the garden.\n- Usage : beer, grain soup, vinegar, etc.

item.name: High-Quality Wheat
item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, etc.

item.desc:
A Cooking ingredient that was produced through Farming.
- How to Obtain: Seeds can be obtained through Plant Breeding in a Garden.

item.name: Byproduct Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\n※ There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.
